name: Event.target
description: The target property of the Event interface is a reference to the object onto which the event was dispatched. It is different from Event.currentTarget when the event handler is called during the bubbling or capturing phase of the event.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'Event.target' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Events Specification.
